title: Kym Marsh completely transformed as she becomes Captain Jack Sparrow for Halloween
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kym Marsh looks completely unrecognisable in her epic Halloween costume.

The Coronation Street star completely transformed her look as she became Captain Jack Sparrow.

Kym will be regularly stopped by fans in the street dying to get a selfie with her, but tonight, people asking for a snap might not even realise who they're posing up with.

The actress, who plays Michelle Connor in the ITV soap, looks incredible as Johnny Depp's famous Pirates of the Caribbean character.

From the beard and heavy black eyeliner to the hat and boots, Kym has nailed the look to perfection.

Posing up for an Instagram snap, she said: "Casual Saturday night heading to my brother’s @1thejonz and his wife’s @peanutsandflowers Halloween party.

(Image: marsh_kym/Instagram)

(Image: The Cleavers / SplashNews.com)

"Giving it my best jack sparrow! Thanks so much @armandbeasley for creating this!! I’m chuffed! Although my moustache is tickling my nose"

People couldn't get over her look.

Love Island's Amber Davies commented: "This is unreal"

While Kym's co-star Lucy Fallon said: "Omg this is sick"

(Image: Unknown)

(Image: Getty Images)

"You handsome devil," joked cobbles actor Ryan Clayton.

Former Hear'Say star Kym, 43, could debut another different look soon if rumours she's headed Down Under are true.

Reports are swirling that Kym is one of the stars heading into the jungle for this year's I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

Kym recently revealed she's leaving Corrie after 13 years to concentrate on other projects.

And she appeared to heavily hint about an upcoming jungle stint in a Good Morning Britain appearance, cheekily saying "never say never" to getting the I'm A Celeb call.

However, Kym has already signed up to perform in Elf the musical later this year, which starts in December, which makes getting to and from the jungle pretty unlikely.

description: The Coronation Street star was unrecognisable as she dressed up as Johnny Depp's Pirates of the Caribbean character
